name: Kalktta Topa
description: The Kalktta Topa Latkan is a bold and stylish embellishment, perfect for adding a dramatic touch to your traditional attire.
highlight:
Latkan Product Details

  • What's Included: 12 Latkan (1 dozen)
  • Suitable for: Traditional and Festive Wear
  • Style: Dramatic and Bold
  • Material: Durable Thread and Beads
  • Season: All Seasons

Features

  • Material: High-quality, long-lasting thread with intricate beadwork
  • Design: Bold design with golden and black accents
  • Fit: Easy to attach to garments
  • Durability: Withstands regular use without wear
  • The actual product may slightly differ in color from the images.

Returns Policy

  • Exchange Reason: Damaged or defective product
  • Return Period: 7 Days
  • Return Policy: Exchange or refund

Return Instructions

  • Keep the item in its original condition and packaging along with the MRP tag and accessories for a successful pick-up.
  • The product should be in unused, undamaged, and original condition without any stains, scratches, tears, or holes.
  • Correct and complete product (with the original brand, article number, undetached MRP tag, product's original packaging, freebies and accessories).
